meta_description_localized.en: Winter blues setting in? Don’t despair – celebrate the season! It’s that time of year – cold winter months in the Northeast and the very best of dining at New York City Winter Restaurant Week.

post_content_localized.en:
Try the best restaurants at New York City Winter Restaurant Week.

Winter blues setting in? Don’t despair – celebrate the season! It’s that time of year – cold winter months in the Northeast and the very best of dining at New York City Winter Restaurant Week.

At New York City Winter Restaurant Week you can enjoy pre fixe dining at some of Manhattan’s most sought after restaurants. Over 300 New York City dining establishments participating will offer three course menus for a fixed price.

The event takes place January 22 through February 9th and reservations are highly encouraged. As of January 8th, you can visit NYCGO to check out which restaurants will be participating and to secure your table.

Take advantage of prix fixe dining: $29 lunches or $42 dinners with 3 courses, appetizer, entrée and dessert.

Most restaurants will have a choice of three options for each course and at least two options for dessert. These businesses will be putting out their best, so it’s a great opportunity to find a new favorite place to try.

Make Winter Restaurant Week a full celebration of NYC and stay overnight with our Winter in NYC Weekend Getaway Package. With luxury suite accommodations, complimentary WiFi and complimentary continental breakfast, everyone here at The Manhattan Club looks forward to welcoming you during this exciting season in NYC.
